Package org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper.annotations

This package declares the annotations specific for Java Bean to RDF mapping.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
Adapt In a a method of a bean is marked with this annotation, then the serialization is performed no more on the bean itself but on the object returned by the annotated method.
Id This annotation marks a method returning the identifier for the containing bean.
Ignore This annotation marks specific property getters that must be ignored by the serializer.
Namespace Allows to specify the default namespace for a bean.
Property Allows to define the URL to be used to represent a property.
Static Defines any object that must be serialized as static.
Subject Allows to customize the URL used to express a subject.
 

Package org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper.annotations Description

This package declares the annotations specific for Java Bean to RDF mapping.
